tosdr.case: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

title: The service informs users that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
quoteText: Please note that if certain features on the Epic services are provided by third parties, those third parties may also use automated means of data collection and may record information about your use of the Epic services or others’ websites over time. These features are subject to those third parties’ privacy notices and policies.
